alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 3:22PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morehouse Parish through 400 PM CST... At 322 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bastrop, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Galion around 340 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Collinston and Mer Rouge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana.
